meanings.definition: A fibrous protein forming the main structural constituent of hair, feathers, hoofs, claws, horns, etc.
meanings.sent1: The keratin in our hair gives it strength and structure.
meanings.sent2: Animals like birds and horses have keratin in their feathers and hoofs.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke about a keratin party where only hair and feathers were allowed!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as tough as keratin, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The keratin in our nails makes them hard and durable.
